name: Existence (itch) (dyep-dev)
description:
Game to be submitted for Astro Game Jam with a theme of Cosmos.

You play as a unknown character whose background is missing and find your way through to uncover these details.

Gameplay Video - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_8JOI5MP01mVUCLbO8Y7IQC6j7HSzDPX/view?usp=shari...

Controls

WSAD to move

F - activate power

E - Interact

-------

Due to my work schedule, development time of the game only manage for roughly 2 days. There are many room for improvements but nevertheless I had fun develop this game!
